All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CreateOptionHandler
This class represents a handler for the "Create" button in the game UI.
Game
The Game class represents a Minesweeper game.
GameOverWindow
This class represents the game over window that appears when the game ends.
GameResult
Represents a game result, which includes the game outcome, the total time remaining, and the number of tries made.
GameResultFileHandler
The GameResultFileHandler class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of game results.
GameWriter
A utility class for writing game configuration files.
InvalidDescriptionException
Exception thrown when an invalid description file is encountered when trying to start a game.
InvalidValueException
An exception that is thrown when an invalid value is present in the specified game description file upon starting the game The message contains the error associated with the value.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the MediaLab Minesweeper game application.
ShowRecordsHandler
This class implements the event handler for showing the game records in a table.
ShowSolutionHandler
An event handler for the "Solution" menu Details option button.
Tile
A Tile represents a single square on the Minesweeper game board.
